title: Junglers with good burst, cc and sustain
body: Please tell me if there is any good junglers that I should get, right now I have kha zix as my main jungler is he any good too?

replies.body: Rek'Sai, Pantheon, Xin Zhao, Jarvan(hard cc no healing), Rengar The list goes on

VOLI!!!!! The  Tank That Tanks The Tanks?

TTTTTT

Voli is really bursty if you build tank thanks to his which legit can 1/2 kill anything (if they are 1/2 health, which can easily be reached because of q and r)
This seems kinda obvious, but i guess {{champion:19}} is a viable option?

Honestly if you like Kha'zix the logical option is Rengar {{champion:107}}  fairly similar

As for a champ with sustain, cc and burst. Fiddlesticks, {{champion:9}} Reksai {{champion:421}}  & Elise {{champion:60}}  the main ones that come to mind.
Maybe even Jungle Irelia? {{champion:39}} or kayle? {{champion:10}} They are uncommon junglers but can be really strong

Kha'zix is ok right now. He struggles a little early but he can still be strong.

So should my next jungler be rengar  becuase I have considered getting him as I have found kha zix is a very squishy champion which I tend to find a bit challenging. Or are both of them not good and I should consider your other options

Rengar is squishy too. Its because they are Assassins so they are supposed to use stealth and a tonne of damage to surprise people and insta-kill them.

I'd say Rek'Sai probably your best bet. He has good sustain, CC etc and you can build him a little tanky

OOOHHH, XIN {{champion:5}} He's ok. He is great for learning how to jungle. You can build him tanky too.
Xin you usually build 2 damage items and 3 tank items so he's not so squishy but he can still kill people pretty fast.
{{champion:9}} {{champion:111}}  both come to mind, naut doesn't have sustain ,but shield kinda negates damage, especially with buff. fid has CC, sustain and dps burst
Elise and Vi are my personal favorites both really fun & OP (at least at my elo)
shyv has good clear and if killing the entire enemy team is a cc then shyvanna can do it very well
